name: Tri: Go
description:
A minimal zen game about clearing your way forward. START GAMECLEAR BELOW
CLEAR RIGHT

Mouse prompts provided by 'thoseawesomeguys'

This game was made by Benedikt Aron Sigurþórsson for Reykjavík University's Advanced Game Design & Development course of 2022, taught by Steingerður Lóa Gunnarsdóttir,  Greta Luise Hoffman, and Guðni Natan Gunnarsson.

We were assigned to make a minimal game using only a single unique sprite and audio file given to each student. I had the triangle and tampani.
